Sequence Information.Peptide Name: IxhDfsin1 (UCSS1a; 3S=S, defensin, natural AMPs; ticks, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (92.11%) toPersulcatusinC: 16%, G: 18%, F=R: 11%. GRAVY: -0.54; mol Wt: 4241.847; mol formula: C180H265N59O48S6; mol ex coeff: 3355.Chemical modification: 3 disulfide bonds.Activity: active against S. aureus (MIC 0.5-1.0 uM) and S. epidermidis (MIC 0.5 uM). Warning: other bacteria not tested.
Literature Information.Author: Yang X, Zhang H, Zuo Z, Qin C, Liu Y, Cao Z, Wu Y.2024
Literature Information.Reference: Int J Biol Macromol. 2024 Oct 31:137151. doi: 10.1016/j.ijbiomac.2024.137151.PubMed
Literature Information.Title: Novel structural determinants and bacterial death-related regulatory effects of the scorpion defensin BmKDfsin4 against gram-positive bacteria
